original_text: Do not forget to help the Levites who live in your towns. Remember that they have not received any land as you have.
korean_text: 네 성읍에 거주하는 레위인은 너희 중에 분깃이나 기업이 없는 자이니 또한 저버리지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: Do not forget to help the Levites
Remember that they have not received any land
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 땅을 받지 못했다는 것을 기억하라
